content.description:
QuestionÂ refers to the following graph.

Congressional Budget Office
content.question: Which of the following factors contributed most to the major trend depicted in the graph?

choices.label: The increase in United States trade with eastern Europe after the Cold War
The declining number of manufacturing jobs in the United States
The expansion of the social safety net through programs like Social Security
The construction of the interstate highway system

content.answer: The declining number of manufacturing jobs in the United States

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
